Verses: 1 aamodhsin Kumaaranaagiya Esaayaa Yoodhaavaiyum Erusalemaiyum Kuriththuk Kanda Dharisanam.
2 kadaisinaatkalil Karththarudaiya Aalayamaagiya Parvadham Parvadhangalin Kodumudiyil Sthaabikkappattu, Malaigalukku Melaai Uyarththappadum; Ellaa Jaadhigalum Adharku Odivaruvaargal.

3 thiralaana Janangal Purappattu Vandhu: Naam Karththarin Parvadhaththukkum, Yaakkobin Dhevanudaiya Aalayaththukkum Povom Vaarungal; Avar Thamadhu Vazhigalai Namakkup Podhippaar, Naam Avar Paadhaigalil Nadappom Enbaargal; Enenil Seeyonilirundhu Vedhamum, Erusalemilirundhu Karththarin Vasanamum Velippadum.

4 avar Jaadhigalukkul Nyaayam Theerththu, Thiralaana Janangalaik Kadindhukolvaar; Appozhudhu Avargal Thangal Pattayangalai Manvettigalaagavum Thangal Eettigalai Arivaalgalaagavum Adippaargal; Jaadhikkuvirodhamaai Jaadhi Pattayam Eduppadhillai, Ini Avargal Yuththaththaik Karpadhumillai.
5 yaakkobin Vamsaththaare, Karththarin Velichchaththile Nadappom Vaarungal.

6 yaakkobin Vamsaththaaraagiya Ummudaiya Janaththaik Kainegizhndheer; Avargal Keezhththisaiyaarin Podhagaththaal Niraindhu, Pelisthiyaraippol Naal Paarkkiravargalaayirundhu, Anniya Puththirar Mel Piriyappadugiraargale.
7 avargal Dhesam Velliyinaalum Ponninaalum Niraindhirukkiradhu; Avargal Pokkishangalukku Mudivillai; Avargal Dhesam Kudhiraigalaalum Niraindhirukkiradhu; Avargal Radhangalukkum Mudivillai.
8 avargal Dhesam Vikkiragangalaalum Niraindhirukkiradhu; Thangal Kaigalin Kiriyaiyaiyum Thangal Viralgal Undupanninadhaiyum Panindhu Kolgiraargal.
9 siriyavanum Kunigiraan, Periyavanum Panigiraan; Aagaiyaal Avargalukku Manniyaadhiruppeer.
10 karththarin Bayangaraththukkum, Avarudaiya Magimaippradhaabaththirkum Vilagi, Nee Kanmalaiyil Odhungi, Mannil Oliththukkol.
11 nararin Mettimaiyaana Kangal Thaazhththappadum, Manusharin Veeraappum Thaniyum; Karththar Oruvare Annaalil Uyarndhiruppaar.
12 ellaam Thaazhththappadumporuttu Senaigaludaiya Karththarin Naalaanadhu Perumaiyum Mettimaiyumaanavai Ellaavatrinmelum, Uyarndhavai Ellaavatrinmelum,
13 leebanonilulla Uyaramum Ongalumaana Ellaak Kedhurukkalinmelum, Paasaanilulla Ellaak Karvaali Marangalin Melum,
14 unnadhamaana Ellaap Parvadhangalinmelum, Uyaramaana Ellaamalaigalinmelum,
15 uyarndha Ellaakkoburaththinmelum, Aranaana Ellaa Madhilinmelum,
16 tharsheesin Kappalgal Ellaavatrinmelum, Ellaa Siththira Vinodhangalinmelum Varum.
17 appozhudhu Nararin Mettimaithaazhndhu, Manusharin Veeraappuththaniyum; Karththar Oruvare Annaalil Uyarndhiruppaar.
18 vikkiragangal Kattode Ozhindhupom.

19 boomiyaith Thaththalikkappannak Karththar Ezhumbumpodhu, Avarudaiya Bayangaraththirkum, Avarudaiya Magimaippradhaabaththirkum Vilagi, Kanmalaigalin Kebigalilum Boomiyin Kugaigalilum Pugundhukolvaargal.
20 boomiyaith Thaththalikkappannak Karththar Ezhumbum Annaalile, Avarudaiya Magimaippradhaabaththirkum Vilagi, Kanmalaigalin Vedippugalilum Kundrugalin Sandhugalilum Pugundhukollumpadikku,
21 manushan Panindhukollath Thanakku Undaakkiyirundha Than Velli Vikkiragangalaiyum, Than Pon Vikkiragangalaiyum, Moonjoorugalukkum Thurinjilgalukkum Erindhuviduvaan.
22 naasiyile Suvaasamulla Manushanai Nambuvadhaivittuvidungal; Ennappaduvadharku Avan Emmaaththiram.
